sentences.en: The dietitian was helpful, making suggestions as to how I could improve my diet.
sentences.cn: 这位饮食学家很有帮助，就我如何能改善膳食提出了建议。

sentences.en: "The typical American diet is a lot higher in protein than a lot of us think," says registered dietitian Angela Pipitone.
sentences.cn: “典型的美国饮食中的蛋白质含量比我们想象的要高得多。”注册营养师安吉拉·皮皮托内说道。
